---
title: "Kasia"
---
Meet Kasia, a passionate and active member of the vibrant Kitchener-Waterloo and Ontario electronic music scene. Known for her beautiful and hypnotic grooves, she has a unique ability to create a sonic experience that gets your body moving and your spirit soaring. With a love for the dance floor, Kasia blends fer favourite genres -- minimal deep tech, deep hous, psy tech, techno and tech house into sets that create community connection and resonate with seasoned dancers and newcomers alike. Get ready to immerse yourself in the music and feel good. Let's get super into it!
